Name: TOP TRUCK DRIVER
About the game: TOP TRUCK DRIVER - a car simulator with a side view, made in 2D hand-drawn graphics. The game has 3 modes: - 'Collect coins', where necessary, driving a car, collect all the coins on the level, while they can be earned additionally for tricks. - 'Race' mode, where you need to overtake opponents and arrive first. - in the 'Free Game' there are 4 maps, they gradually open with the passage of levels for collecting coins and races. Collect coins, do tricks, buy new cars, leave all opponents behind!
